thread.title: Your guide to all things related to 'Back to the Future' day
thread.title_full: Your guide to all things related to 'Back to the Future' day

title: Your guide to all things related to 'Back to the Future' day
text:
Your guide to all things related to 'Back to the Future' day POSTED: 05:34 PM MDT Oct 21, 2015 Large Text From NBCU via CNN 
Wednesday marks the unofficial celebration of "Back to the Future" Day, the Oct. 21, 2015, date that Marty McFly travels to in 1989's "Back to the Future Part II." To mark the occasion, check up on the stars of the blockbuster film series. 
Click on links below for all things a part of "Back to the Future" day.
